text: The Colombo Cricket Club in Sri Lanka has been active since 1863. The team has first-class status, and competes in the Major League Tournament which they have won eight times, most recently in 2022â€“23. Their home ground is the Colombo Cricket Club Ground in the Maitland district of Colombo. ==References== Category:First-class cricket teams in Sri Lanka Category:1863 establishments in Sri Lanka
title: Colombo Cricket Club
